title: BBOT
desc: BBOT is a recursive, modular, Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) gathering framework. BBOT has been designed to support offensive and defensive cyber operations, including enterprise-wide Attack Surface Management (ASM)

title: Writehat
desc: We've all experienced the frustrations that accompany formatting, placement, and content generation. WriteHat enables consultants to quickly and easily generate reports based on raw data, screenshots, and re-usable content.

title: SplinterNET
sub_title: Execute continuous attacks for up to the minute detection and prevention.
desc: Breach and Attack simulation (BAS) provides for continuous validation and improvement of network-, host-, email-, and web-based security controls.

title: TrevorSpray
desc: TREVORspray is a modular password sprayer with threading, SSH proxying, loot modules, and more!

title: badDNS
desc: BadDNS is a standalone tool and BBOT module for detecting domain/subdomain takeovers of all kinds, including other DNS issues like NSEC walks and Subdomain Takeovers.

title: ManSpider
desc: Crawl SMB shares for juicy information. File content searching + regex is supported!
